text: The Kankakee River () is a tributary of the Illinois River. It is about long,U.S. Geological Survey. National Hydrography Dataset high-resolution flowline data. The National Map , accessed May 13, 2011 in northwestern Indiana and northeastern Illinois in the United States. It flows through a primarily rural farming region of reclaimed cropland, south of Lake Michigan. ==References== Category:Rivers of Illinois
title: Kankakee River
